:45A:.value: CFR PORT KEAMARI KARACHI, PAKISTAN / PORT QASIM (FOTCO) KARACHI, PAKISTAN QTY: 25,500 MT PLUS / MINUS 05 PCT OF MOGAS 92-RON . (+) THE VALUE OF THIS L/C DOES NOT EXCEED US DOLLARS TWENTY MILLION FOUR HUNDRED FIFTY FIVE THOUSAND THREE HUNDRED THIRTY SEVEN COVERS SHIPMENT OF QUANTITY OF 25,500 MT PLUS / MINUS 05 PCT OF MOGAS 92- RON CFR, PORT KEAMARI KARACHI, PAKISTAN / PORT QASIM (FOTCO) KARACHI, PAKISTAN AND IS AVAILABLE FOR PAYMENT IN USD AGAINST PRESENTATIONS OF DOCUMENTS STIPULATED IN THE L/C IN AN AMOUNT WORKED AT A BELOW STATED PRICE DIRECTLY PROPORTIONAL TO THE BILL OF LADING QUANTITY. WHETHER LOADING OF PRODUCT IS EFFECTED, FROM SHIP OR FROM SHORE TANKS, THE RECEIPTED QUANTITY AT THE PORT OF DELIVERY OR THE BILL OF LADING QUANTITY, WHICHEVER IS LOWER, SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE THE BILL OF LADING QUANTITY FOR THE PURPOSE OF PAYMENTS TO THE SELLER. (+) IN CASE VESSEL NOR TENDER DATE AT DISCHARGE PORT FALLS WITHIN FOUR DAYS (96 HOURS) OF THE LAST DAY OF THE SPECIFIED DELIVERY LAYCAN THEN RELEVANT B/L DATE FOR PRICING AND PAYMENT WILL BE ACTUAL B/L DATE. IN CASE VESSEL NOR TENDER DATE AT DISCHARGE PORT FALLS FOUR DAYS (96 HOURS) AFTER THE LAST DAY OF THE SPECIFIED DELIVERY LAYCAN 01-03/06/2023, THEN PRICE WILL BE CALCULATED BASED ON THE RELEVANT B/L DATE I.E. ACTUAL B/L DATE OR 10/05/2023 (DEEMED B/L DATE I.E. MIDDLE DATE OF ALLOCATED LOADING LAYCAN) WHICHEVER IS LOWER. . ++ PRICE ++ . PRICE IS TO BE CFR, PORT KEAMARI KARACHI, PAKISTAN / PORT QASIM (FOTCO) KARACHI, PAKISTAN, ON B/L QUANTITY OR QUANTITY RECEIVED IN DISCHARGE PORT (WHICHEVER IS LESS). CFR PRICE WOULD BE BASED ON THE MEAN OF FIVE DAYS HIGH AND LOW QUOTATIONS AS PUBLISHED IN PLATT'S ASIA-PACIFIC/ARAB GULF MARKETSCAN (APAG) QUOTATIONS FOR GASOLINE 92 UNDER THE HEADING 'FOB ARAB GULF' CENTERED ON B/L DATE (IN CASE VESSEL TENDER NOR AT DISCHARGE PORT WITHIN 4 DAYS OF LAST DAY OF ALLOTTED DELIVERY LAYCAN) OR CENTERED ON RELEVANT B/L DATE AS SPECIFIED IN ABOVE (OTHER TERMS). IF THERE IS NO PUBLICATION OF PLATT'S UNDER THE HEADING 'FOB ARAB GULF' FOR GASOLINE 92 ON RELEVANT B/L DATE THEN TWO EFFECTIVE QUOTATIONS IMMEDIATELY BEFORE RELEVANT B/L DATE AND THREE EFFECTIVE QUOTATIONS AFTER RELEVANT B/L DATE SHALL APPLY, PLUS FIXED PREMIUM OF USD 11.599 PER BARREL. ANY PUBLISHED CORRECTION TO ANY THE EFFECTIVE PLATS QUOTATIONS FOR THE ABOVE PRICING PERIOD SHALL BE AUTOMATICALLY APPLIED FOR PRICING, INVOICING AND PAYMENT PURPOSES. INVOICE QUANTITY SHALL BE BASIS LOAD PORT SHORE TANK (S) LOADED QUANTITY AS EVIDENCED IN THE BILL OF LADING OR ACTUAL OUTTURN QUANTITY AT DISCHARGE PORT WHICHEVER IS LOWER SAVE FOR FRAUD AND / OR MANIFEST ERROR' AFTER THE WORDING USD11.599 PER BARREL.
:45A:.raw_text:
Description of Goods and/or Services
  CFR PORT KEAMARI KARACHI, PAKISTAN / PORT QASIM (FOTCO) KARACHI,
  PAKISTAN
  QTY: 25,500 MT PLUS / MINUS 05 PCT OF MOGAS 92-RON
  .
  (+) THE VALUE OF THIS L/C DOES NOT EXCEED US DOLLARS TWENTY
  MILLION FOUR HUNDRED FIFTY FIVE THOUSAND THREE HUNDRED THIRTY
  SEVEN COVERS SHIPMENT OF  QUANTITY OF 25,500 MT PLUS / MINUS 05
  PCT OF MOGAS 92- RON CFR, PORT KEAMARI KARACHI, PAKISTAN / PORT
  QASIM (FOTCO)  KARACHI, PAKISTAN AND IS AVAILABLE FOR PAYMENT IN
  USD AGAINST PRESENTATIONS OF DOCUMENTS STIPULATED IN THE L/C IN
  AN AMOUNT WORKED AT A BELOW STATED PRICE DIRECTLY PROPORTIONAL TO
  THE BILL OF LADING QUANTITY. WHETHER LOADING OF PRODUCT IS
  EFFECTED, FROM SHIP OR FROM SHORE TANKS, THE RECEIPTED QUANTITY
  AT THE PORT OF DELIVERY OR THE BILL OF LADING QUANTITY, WHICHEVER
  IS LOWER, SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE THE BILL OF LADING QUANTITY FOR
  THE PURPOSE OF PAYMENTS TO THE SELLER.
  (+) IN CASE VESSEL NOR TENDER DATE AT DISCHARGE PORT FALLS WITHIN
  FOUR DAYS (96 HOURS) OF THE LAST DAY OF THE SPECIFIED DELIVERY
  LAYCAN THEN RELEVANT B/L DATE FOR PRICING AND PAYMENT WILL BE
  ACTUAL B/L DATE. IN CASE VESSEL NOR TENDER DATE AT DISCHARGE PORT
  FALLS FOUR DAYS (96 HOURS) AFTER THE LAST DAY OF THE SPECIFIED
  DELIVERY LAYCAN 01-03/06/2023, THEN PRICE WILL BE CALCULATED
  BASED ON THE RELEVANT B/L DATE I.E. ACTUAL B/L DATE OR 10/05/2023
  (DEEMED B/L DATE I.E. MIDDLE DATE OF ALLOCATED LOADING LAYCAN)
  WHICHEVER IS LOWER.
  .
  ++ PRICE ++
  .
  PRICE IS TO BE CFR, PORT KEAMARI KARACHI, PAKISTAN / PORT QASIM
  (FOTCO) KARACHI, PAKISTAN, ON B/L QUANTITY OR QUANTITY RECEIVED
  IN DISCHARGE PORT (WHICHEVER IS LESS). CFR PRICE WOULD BE BASED

  GASOLINE 92 UNDER THE HEADING 'FOB ARAB GULF' CENTERED ON B/L
  DATE (IN CASE VESSEL TENDER NOR AT DISCHARGE PORT WITHIN 4 DAYS
  OF LAST DAY OF ALLOTTED DELIVERY LAYCAN) OR CENTERED ON RELEVANT
  B/L DATE AS SPECIFIED IN ABOVE (OTHER TERMS).  IF THERE IS NO
  PUBLICATION OF PLATT'S UNDER THE HEADING 'FOB ARAB GULF' FOR
  GASOLINE 92 ON RELEVANT B/L DATE THEN TWO EFFECTIVE QUOTATIONS
  IMMEDIATELY BEFORE RELEVANT B/L DATE AND THREE EFFECTIVE

  ANY PUBLISHED CORRECTION TO ANY THE EFFECTIVE PLATS QUOTATIONS

  PRICING, INVOICING AND PAYMENT PURPOSES. INVOICE QUANTITY SHALL
  BE BASIS LOAD PORT SHORE TANK (S) LOADED QUANTITY AS EVIDENCED IN
  THE BILL OF LADING OR ACTUAL OUTTURN QUANTITY AT DISCHARGE PORT
  WHICHEVER IS LOWER SAVE FOR FRAUD AND / OR MANIFEST ERROR' AFTER

:47A:.value: (1) PHOTOCOPIES OF SIGNED DOCUMENTS ACCEPTABLE WHERE SIGNED COPIES REQUIRED. (2) PRODUCT INSURANCE ON OPENER'S ACCOUNT. INSURANCE IS COVERED BY APPLICANT THROUGH NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANY LIMITED, KARACHI PAKISTAN. ESTIMATED SHIPMENT DETAILS TO BE ADVISED TO N.I.C.L 5 DAYS BEFORE AND ACTUAL SHIPMENT DETAILS 5 DAYS AFTER THE ACTUAL DATE OF SHIPMENT AT NICL'S FAX NOS. 0092 21 99225864 / 99225075 AND/OR EMAIL TO MUHAMMADUSMAN@NICL.COM.PK, MUHAMMAD.AWAIS@NICL.COM.PK REFERRING TO THEIR NOMINEE OPEN POLICY NO. NICL/M/SZ/OP/PSO/3452/2023. INSURANCE ADVICE TO THIS EFFECT FROM BENEFICIARY MUST ACCOMPANY ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS. (3) ONE COMPLETE SET OF COPIES DOCUMENTS SHOULD BE FAXED OR EMAIL DIRECTLY TO THE OPENER (FAX NO.0092 21 99203728 OR TRADEFINANCE(AT)PSOPK.COM). (FAX TRANSMISSION SLIP OR COPY OF EMAIL TO THIS EFFECT SHOULD ACCOMPANY THE DOCUMENTS). (4) GOODS ARE IMPORTABLE UNDER THE FOLLOWING H.S.AND IMPORTER'S N.T.N NUMBER WHICH SHOULD APPEAR ON INVOICES. + H.S.NUMBER(S) 2710.1210 + IMPORTER'S N.T.N NUMBER 0711554-7 (5) DOCUMENTS PRESENTED WITHIN 30 DAYS FROM THE VESSEL NOTICE OF READINESS AT DISCHARGE PORT DATE AND WITHIN THE VALIDITY OF L/C ARE ACCEPTABLE. ALL DOCUMENTS MUST BE PROPERLY STAMPED. (6) IF THE DUE DATE OF PAYMENT FALLS ON A NON-BANKING DAY IN PAKISTAN AND/OR IN THE COUNTRY OF CURRENCY OF LETTER OF CREDIT, PAYMENT SHALL BE MADE ON A BANKING DAY IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING THE DUE DATE OF PAYMENT. (7) IN CASE OF TEMPORARILY MISSING DOCUMENTS AT THE TIME WHEN PAYMENT IS DUE, PAYMENT SHALL BE EFFECTED AGAINST (I) SIGNED COMMERCIAL INVOICE IN ONE ORIGINAL PLUS TWO COPIES. (II) BANK GUARANTEE IN FAVOR OF APPLICANT, THROUGH ANY BANK IN PAKISTAN AND IS A SCHEDULED BANK, AS DEFINED IN STATE BANK OF PAKISTAN ACT 1956. (III) ISSUANCE OF ACCEPTANCE LETTER OF BANK GUARANTEE BY THE APPLICANT IN FAVOR OF THE BENEFICIARY. (IV) 03 ORIGINAL PLUS 03 NON-NEGOTIABLE COPIES OF CLEAN ON BOARD BILL OF LADING AS MENTIONED IN CLAUSE 46A(3) OF THE LIST OF CLEAN LC DOCUMENTS MENTIONED ABOVE. (8) PRODUCT INSURANCE ON OPENER'S ACCOUNT AND VESSEL OVERAGE INSURANCE TO BE ON SELLER'S ACCOUNT. (9) DRAFT BILLS OF EXCHANGE NOT REQUIRED. (10) ALL BANK CHARGES OUTSIDE PAKISTAN INCLUDING L/C CONFIRMATION CHARGES TO BE PAYABLE BY BENEFICIARY, CONFIRMATION MAY BE ADDED IF REQUIRED BY THE BENEFICIARY. (11) CHARTER PARTY AND/OR TANKER BILL OF LADING ACCEPTABLE. (12) SPELLING AND/OR TYPOGRAPHICAL ERRORS IN L/C AND OR IN DOCUMENTS EXCEPT IN FIGURE AND AMOUNT ARE NOT TO BE TREATED AS DISCREPANCY. (13) THIRD PARTY DOCUMENTS EXCEPT INVOICE ARE ACCEPTABLE. (14) NAME OF THE DOCUMENTS EXCEPT BILL OF LADING AND INVOICE DIFFERENT FROM L/C BUT SERVE THE SAME PURPOSE ARE ACCEPTABLE. (15) ALL INVOICE(S) MUST INDICATE SHORE TO SHIP OR SHIP-TO-SHIP LOADING AND HS NO. 2710.1210 (16) HOUSE/FORWARDER BILL OF LADING/NON-NEGOTIABLE SEA WAY BILL NOT ACCEPTABLE. (17) TENOR OF L/C TO READ AS ''AT 30 CALENDAR DAYS FROM NOR AT DISCHARGE PORT (NOR DATE TO COUNT AS DAY 1)''. (18) IN CASE THE VESSEL SINKS, DOCUMENT NO.1 OF FIELD 46A (NOR) AND DOCUMENT NO.10 OF FIELD 46A (CERTIFICATE OF RECEIPTED QUANTITY) ARE NOT REQUIRED FOR PAYMENT NEGOTIATION. (19) IF BENEFICIARY PRESENTS DOCUMENTS NO.1 OF FIELD 46A (NOR) THEN DOCUMENT NO.9 OF FIELD 46A (AUTHENTIC REPORT OF SHIPPING INTELLIGENCE) IS NOT REQUIRED FOR PAYMENT NEGOTIATION. (20) IF THE VESSEL SUNK, PAYMENT SHALL BE MADE TO THE BENEFICIARY AFTER 60 DAYS FROM THE DATE OF B/L (B/L DATE TO COUNT AS DAY ONE) ON THE BASIS OF B/L QUANTITY. (21) SHIPMENT ON ISRAELI, FLAGGED VESSELS NOT ALLOWED AND A CERTIFICATE TO THIS EFFECT FROM BENEFICIARY MUST ACCOMPANY ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS. (22) WE DISCLAIM LIABILITY FOR DELAY, NON-RETURN OF DOCUMENTS, NON-PAYMENT, OR OTHER ACTION OR INACTION COMPELLED BY RESTRICTIVE MEASURES, COUNTER-MEASURES, SANCTIONS LAWS, REGULATIONS OR EXECUTIVE OR JUDICIAL ORDERS MANDATORILY APPLICABLE TO US OR TO OUR CORRESPONDENT IN THE RELEVANT TRANSACTION. (23) DIFFERENCES IN QUANTITY SHOWN ON SHIPPING DOCUMENTS ARE ACCEPTABLE (24) THE MEASUREMENT OF QUANTITY RECEIVED ON VESSELS EXPERIENCE FACTOR CERTIFICATE SHOWING LAST CALL PORT INCONSISTENT WITH PORT CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE ACCEPTABLE. (25) GOODS DESCRIBED ON SHIPPING AND OTHER DOCUMENTS NEED NOT BE IDENTICAL TO THE DESCRIPTION OF GOODS IN THIS LC. HOWEVER, MOGAS 92 RON SHOULD NECESSARILY BE MENTIONED ON THE DOCUMENTS EXCEPT ON PORT CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE. (26) ALL DOCUMENTS TO BE ISSUED IN ENGLISH LANGUAGE. . +++FIELD 44F+++++ PORT KEAMARI, KARACHI PAKISTAN/PORT QASIM (FOTCO) KARACHI PAKISTAN . +++CONT'D FROM FIELD 78+++ (+) UPON RECEIPT (DURING THE WORKING HOURS IN PAKISTAN) BY THE OPENER OF THE TESTED AUTHENTICATED SWIFT OF THE NEGOTIATING BANK CONFIRMING THAT THE NEGOTIATING BANK HAS NEGOTIATED DOCUMENTS ISSUED IN STRICT CONFORMITY WITH THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS CREDIT AND HAS DISPATCHED THE DOCUMENTS BY REGISTERED MAIL/ COURIER TO OUR ADDRESS SHOWING THE REGISTERED MAIL NO./ COURIER RECEIPT NO. AND DATE OF DISPATCH OF DOCUMENTS, THE NEGOTIATING BANK WILL REIMBURSE VIA REIMBURSING BANK AT MATURITY DATE ACCORDING TO ITS INSTRUCTIONS. HOWEVER, PAYMENT WILL BE EXECUTED AFTER 3 WORKING DAYS AFTER RECEIPT OF COMPLYING DOCUMENTS OR SWIFT MESSAGE CONFIRMING PRESENTATION OF COMPLYING DOCUMENTS

  + H.S.CODE NUMBER(S) 2710.1210

  (6) IF THE DUE DATE OF PAYMENT FALLS ON A NON-BANKING DAY IN
  PAKISTAN AND/OR IN THE COUNTRY OF CURRENCY OF LETTER OF CREDIT,
  PAYMENT SHALL BE MADE ON A BANKING DAY IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING THE
  DUE DATE OF PAYMENT.
  (7) IN CASE OF TEMPORARILY MISSING DOCUMENTS AT THE TIME WHEN
  PAYMENT IS DUE, PAYMENT SHALL BE EFFECTED AGAINST
  (I) SIGNED COMMERCIAL INVOICE IN ONE ORIGINAL PLUS TWO COPIES.
  (II) BANK GUARANTEE IN FAVOR OF APPLICANT, THROUGH ANY BANK IN
  PAKISTAN AND IS A SCHEDULED BANK, AS DEFINED IN STATE BANK OF
  PAKISTAN ACT 1956.
  (III) ISSUANCE OF ACCEPTANCE LETTER OF BANK GUARANTEE BY THE
  APPLICANT IN FAVOR OF THE BENEFICIARY.
  (IV) 03 ORIGINAL PLUS 03 NON-NEGOTIABLE COPIES OF CLEAN ON BOARD
  BILL OF LADING AS MENTIONED IN CLAUSE 46A(3) OF THE LIST OF CLEAN
  LC DOCUMENTS MENTIONED ABOVE.
  (8) PRODUCT INSURANCE ON OPENER'S ACCOUNT AND VESSEL OVERAGE
  INSURANCE TO BE ON SELLER'S ACCOUNT.
  (9) DRAFT BILLS OF EXCHANGE NOT REQUIRED.
  (10) ALL BANK CHARGES OUTSIDE PAKISTAN INCLUDING L/C CONFIRMATION

  (11) CHARTER PARTY AND/OR TANKER BILL OF LADING ACCEPTABLE.
  (12) SPELLING AND/OR TYPOGRAPHICAL ERRORS IN L/C AND OR IN
  DOCUMENTS EXCEPT IN FIGURE AND AMOUNT ARE NOT TO BE TREATED AS
  DISCREPANCY.
  (13) THIRD PARTY DOCUMENTS EXCEPT INVOICE ARE ACCEPTABLE.
  (14) NAME OF THE DOCUMENTS EXCEPT BILL OF LADING AND INVOICE
  DIFFERENT FROM L/C BUT SERVE THE SAME PURPOSE ARE ACCEPTABLE.
  (15) ALL INVOICE(S) MUST INDICATE SHORE TO SHIP OR SHIP-TO-SHIP
  LOADING AND HS CODE NO. 2710.1210
  (16) HOUSE/FORWARDER BILL OF LADING/NON-NEGOTIABLE SEA WAY BILL
  NOT ACCEPTABLE.
  (17) TENOR OF L/C TO READ AS ''AT 30 CALENDAR DAYS FROM NOR AT
  DISCHARGE PORT (NOR DATE TO COUNT AS DAY 1)''.
  (18) IN CASE THE VESSEL SINKS, DOCUMENT NO.1 OF FIELD 46A (NOR)
  AND DOCUMENT NO.10 OF FIELD 46A (CERTIFICATE OF RECEIPTED
  QUANTITY) ARE NOT REQUIRED FOR PAYMENT NEGOTIATION.
  (19) IF BENEFICIARY PRESENTS DOCUMENTS NO.1 OF FIELD 46A (NOR)
  THEN DOCUMENT NO.9 OF FIELD 46A (AUTHENTIC REPORT OF SHIPPING
  INTELLIGENCE) IS NOT REQUIRED FOR PAYMENT NEGOTIATION.
  (20) IF THE VESSEL SUNK, PAYMENT SHALL BE MADE TO THE BENEFICIARY
  AFTER 60 DAYS FROM THE DATE OF B/L (B/L DATE TO COUNT AS DAY ONE)
  ON THE BASIS OF B/L QUANTITY.
  (21) SHIPMENT ON ISRAELI, FLAGGED VESSELS NOT ALLOWED AND A
  CERTIFICATE TO THIS EFFECT FROM BENEFICIARY MUST ACCOMPANY

  (22) WE DISCLAIM LIABILITY FOR DELAY, NON-RETURN OF DOCUMENTS,

  (23) DIFFERENCES IN QUANTITY SHOWN ON SHIPPING DOCUMENTS ARE

  (24) THE MEASUREMENT OF QUANTITY RECEIVED ON VESSELS EXPERIENCE
  FACTOR CERTIFICATE SHOWING LAST CALL PORT INCONSISTENT WITH PORT

  (25) GOODS DESCRIBED ON SHIPPING AND OTHER DOCUMENTS NEED NOT BE
  IDENTICAL TO THE DESCRIPTION OF GOODS IN THIS LC. HOWEVER, MOGAS
  92 RON SHOULD NECESSARILY BE MENTIONED ON THE DOCUMENTS EXCEPT ON

  (26) ALL DOCUMENTS TO BE ISSUED IN ENGLISH LANGUAGE.

ILC07860544623PK STATING THE CONTRACT PRICE CFR, PORT KEAMARI, KARACHI PAKISTAN/PORT QASIM (FOTCO) KARACHI PAKISTAN AND SHOWING PRICE CALCULATION AS PER THE PRICE CLAUSE IN THIS L/C, MENTIONING GOODS OF CHINA ORIGIN. 3. 3/3 ORIGINAL PLUS 3 NON-NEGOTIABLE COPIES OF CLEAN ON BOARD BILL OF LADING ISSUED OR ENDORSED TO THE ORDER OF HBL KARACHI, PAKISTAN AND NOTIFY PAKISTAN STATE OIL COMPANY LIMITED, KARACHI, PAKISTAN. WHEN SIGNED BY AGENT OF THE MASTER, ONE COPY OR EMAIL OF MASTER'S AUTHORITY TO BE SUBMITTED FOR THE QUANTITY APPEARING ON BILL OF LADING. THE BILL OF LADING TO INDICATE, 'FREIGHT PREPAID' OR 'FREIGHT PAYABLE AS PER CHARTER PARTY AGREEMENT' AND TO BE DELIVERED TO THE PORT OF KEAMARI, KARACHI, PAKISTAN / PORT QASIM, (FOTCO) KARACHI, PAKISTAN. 4. 3 SIGNED COPIES OF LOAD PORT INDEPENDENT INSPECTOR M/S CCIC SURVEYOR REPORT COMPRISING TANKER CLEANLINESS, PRODUCTS QUALITY AND QUANTITY CERTIFICATES, SHORE TANK MEASUREMENTS BEFORE AND AFTER LOADING AND THE MEASUREMENTS OF QUANTITY RECEIVED ON VESSEL'S EXPERIENCE FACTOR SHOWING AT LEAST LAST FIVE PORTS OF CALL OR LOAD PORT WITH DATES AND CARGOES CARRIED ISSUED BY LOAD PORT SURVEYOR M/S CCIC. 5. ONE ORIGINAL PLUS 3 SIGNED COPIES OF CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN ISSUED OR COUNTERSIGNED BY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE OR RELEVANT PORT AUTHORITIES OR RELEVANT TERMINAL OPERATOR (ISSUED IN THE NAME OF APPLICANT AS CONSIGNEE ACCEPTABLE) MENTIONING GOODS OF CHINA ORIGIN. 6. 3 SIGNED COPIES OF TIME SHEET ISSUED BY M/S CCIC. 7. COPY OF MASTER'S RECEIPT FOR SEALED SAMPLES AT LOAD PORT (DULY SIGNED BY THE MASTER UNDER HIS OFFICIAL SEAL). 8. THREE SIGNED COPIES OF 'PORT CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE' ISSUED BY LAST PORT CALL. IN CASE OF ELECTRONICALLY GENERATED CERTIFICATE NO SIGNATURE IS REQUIRED. 9. IN CASE THE VESSEL SINKS, THREE SIGNED COPIES OF AUTHENTIC REPORT OF SHIPPING INTELLIGENCE, A.I. LLOYDS OR REPORT FROM INSURER OF HULL AND MACHINERY OF VESSEL REGARDING SINKING OF VESSEL IN CASE VESSEL SINKS. 10. THREE SIGNED COPIES OF ''CERTIFICATE OF RECEIPTED QUANTITY'' ISSUED BY INDEPENDENT PETROLEUM INSPECTOR M/S TO BE NOMINATED AT DISCHARGE PORT, STATING THE NAME OF THE PRODUCT, NAME OF THE VESSEL, BILL OF LADING DATE, AND RECEIPTED QUANTITY IN METRIC TONS BASED ON SHORE TANK VOLUME CALCULATED BY APPLYING CORRESPONDING DENSITY OF EACH SHORE TANK AFTER RECEIPT AT DISCHARGE PORT AT 15 DEGREE C.
:46A:.raw_text:
Documents Required
  1.COPY OF VESSEL'S NOTICE OF READINESS AT DISCHARGE PORT SERVED
  BY MASTER OF THE VESSEL OR HIS AGENT.
  2.TWO ORIGINAL PLUS FOUR COPIES OF SIGNED INVOICE BEARING THIS
  L/C NO. ILC07860544623PK STATING THE CONTRACT PRICE CFR, PORT
  KEAMARI, KARACHI PAKISTAN/PORT QASIM (FOTCO) KARACHI PAKISTAN AND
  SHOWING PRICE CALCULATION AS PER THE PRICE CLAUSE IN THIS L/C,
  MENTIONING GOODS OF CHINA ORIGIN.
  3. 3/3 ORIGINAL PLUS 3 NON-NEGOTIABLE COPIES OF CLEAN ON BOARD
  BILL OF LADING ISSUED OR ENDORSED TO THE ORDER OF HBL KARACHI,
  PAKISTAN AND NOTIFY PAKISTAN STATE OIL COMPANY LIMITED, KARACHI,
  PAKISTAN.  BILL OF LADING TO BE DULY SIGNED BY THE MASTER UNDER
  HIS OFFICIAL SEAL OR MASTER'S AGENT FOR AND ON BEHALF OF THE
  MASTER UNDER HIS OFFICIAL SEAL. WHEN SIGNED BY AGENT OF THE
  MASTER, ONE COPY OR EMAIL OF MASTER'S AUTHORITY TO BE SUBMITTED
  FOR THE QUANTITY APPEARING ON BILL OF LADING.  THE BILL OF LADING
  TO INDICATE, 'FREIGHT PREPAID' OR 'FREIGHT PAYABLE AS PER CHARTER
  PARTY AGREEMENT' AND TO BE DELIVERED TO THE PORT OF KEAMARI,
  KARACHI, PAKISTAN / PORT QASIM, (FOTCO) KARACHI, PAKISTAN.
  4. 3 SIGNED COPIES OF LOAD PORT INDEPENDENT INSPECTOR M/S CCIC
  SURVEYOR REPORT COMPRISING TANKER CLEANLINESS, PRODUCTS QUALITY
  AND QUANTITY CERTIFICATES, SHORE TANK MEASUREMENTS BEFORE AND
  AFTER LOADING AND THE MEASUREMENTS OF QUANTITY RECEIVED ON
  VESSEL'S EXPERIENCE FACTOR SHOWING AT LEAST LAST FIVE PORTS OF
  CALL OR LOAD PORT WITH DATES AND CARGOES CARRIED ISSUED BY LOAD
  PORT SURVEYOR M/S CCIC.
  5. ONE ORIGINAL PLUS 3 SIGNED COPIES OF CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN
  ISSUED OR COUNTERSIGNED BY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE OR RELEVANT PORT
  AUTHORITIES OR RELEVANT TERMINAL OPERATOR (ISSUED IN THE NAME OF
  APPLICANT AS CONSIGNEE ACCEPTABLE) MENTIONING GOODS OF CHINA
  ORIGIN.
  6. 3 SIGNED COPIES OF TIME SHEET ISSUED BY M/S CCIC.
  7. COPY OF MASTER'S RECEIPT FOR SEALED SAMPLES AT LOAD PORT (DULY
  SIGNED BY THE MASTER UNDER HIS OFFICIAL SEAL).
  8. THREE SIGNED COPIES OF 'PORT CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE' ISSUED BY
  LAST PORT CALL. IN CASE OF ELECTRONICALLY GENERATED CERTIFICATE
  NO SIGNATURE IS REQUIRED.
  9. IN CASE THE VESSEL SINKS, THREE SIGNED COPIES OF AUTHENTIC
  REPORT OF SHIPPING INTELLIGENCE, A.I. LLOYDS OR REPORT FROM
  INSURER OF HULL AND MACHINERY OF VESSEL REGARDING SINKING OF
  VESSEL IN CASE VESSEL SINKS.
  10. THREE SIGNED COPIES OF ''CERTIFICATE OF RECEIPTED QUANTITY''
  ISSUED BY INDEPENDENT PETROLEUM INSPECTOR M/S TO BE NOMINATED AT
  DISCHARGE PORT, STATING THE NAME OF THE PRODUCT, NAME OF THE
  VESSEL, BILL OF LADING DATE, AND RECEIPTED QUANTITY IN METRIC
  TONS BASED ON SHORE TANK VOLUME CALCULATED BY APPLYING
  CORRESPONDING DENSITY OF EACH SHORE TANK AFTER RECEIPT AT
  DISCHARGE PORT AT 15 DEGREE C.

additional_conditions.text: PHOTOCOPIES OF SIGNED DOCUMENTS ACCEPTABLE WHERE SIGNED COPIES REQUIRED.

PRODUCT INSURANCE ON OPENER'S ACCOUNT. INSURANCE IS COVERED BY APPLICANT THROUGH NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANY LIMITED, KARACHI PAKISTAN. ESTIMATED SHIPMENT DETAILS TO BE ADVISED TO N.I.C.L AT LEAST 3 DAYS BEFORE AND ACTUAL SHIPMENT DETAILS AT MOST 3 DAYS AFTER THE ACTUAL DATE OF SHIPMENT AT NICL'S FAX NOS. 0092 21 99225864 / 99225075 AND/OR EMAIL TO MUHAMMADUSMAN@NICL.COM.PK, MUHAMMAD.AWAIS@NICL.COM.PK REFERRING TO THEIR NOMINEE OPEN POLICY NO. NICL/M/SZ/OP/PSO/3452/2023. INSURANCE ADVICE TO THIS EFFECT FROM BENEFICIARY MUST ACCOMPANY ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS.

ONE COMPLETE SET OF COPIES DOCUMENTS SHOULD BE FAXED OR EMAIL DIRECTLY TO THE OPENER (FAX NO.0092 21 99203728 OR TRADEFINANCE(AT)PSOPK.COM). (FAX TRANSMISSION SLIP OR COPY OF EMAIL TO THIS EFFECT SHOULD ACCOMPANY THE DOCUMENTS).
GOODS ARE IMPORTABLE UNDER THE FOLLOWING H.S.AND IMPORTER'S N.T.N NUMBER WHICH SHOULD APPEAR ON INVOICES. + H.S.NUMBER(S) 2710.1210 + IMPORTER'S N.T.N NUMBER 0711554-7
DOCUMENTS PRESENTED WITHIN 45 DAYS FROM THE VESSEL NOTICE OF READINESS AT DISCHARGE PORT DATE AND WITHIN THE VALIDITY OF L/C ARE ACCEPTABLE. ALL DOCUMENTS MUST BE PROPERLY STAMPED.

IF THE DUE DATE OF PAYMENT FALLS ON A NON-BANKING DAY IN PAKISTAN AND/OR IN THE COUNTRY OF CURRENCY OF LETTER OF CREDIT, PAYMENT SHALL BE MADE ON A BANKING DAY IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING THE DUE DATE OF PAYMENT.

IN CASE OF TEMPORARILY MISSING DOCUMENTS AT THE TIME WHEN PAYMENT IS DUE, PAYMENT SHALL BE EFFECTED AGAINST (I) SIGNED COMMERCIAL INVOICE IN ONE ORIGINAL PLUS TWO COPIES. (II) BANK GUARANTEE IN FAVOR OF APPLICANT, THROUGH ANY BANK IN PAKISTAN AND IS A SCHEDULED BANK, AS DEFINED IN STATE BANK OF PAKISTAN ACT 1956. (III) ISSUANCE OF ACCEPTANCE LETTER OF BANK GUARANTEE BY THE APPLICANT IN FAVOR OF THE BENEFICIARY. (IV) 03 ORIGINAL PLUS 03 NON-NEGOTIABLE COPIES OF CLEAN ON BOARD BILL OF LADING AS MENTIONED IN CLAUSE 46A(3) OF THE LIST OF CLEAN LC DOCUMENTS MENTIONED ABOVE.
PRODUCT INSURANCE ON OPENER'S ACCOUNT AND VESSEL OVERAGE INSURANCE TO BE ON SELLER'S ACCOUNT.
DRAFT BILLS OF EXCHANGE NOT REQUIRED.
ALL BANK CHARGES OUTSIDE PAKISTAN INCLUDING L/C CONFIRMATION CHARGES TO BE PAYABLE BY BENEFICIARY, CONFIRMATION MAY BE ADDED IF REQUIRED BY THE BENEFICIARY.
CHARTER PARTY AND/OR TANKER BILL OF LADING ACCEPTABLE.
SPELLING AND/OR TYPOGRAPHICAL ERRORS IN L/C AND OR IN DOCUMENTS EXCEPT IN FIGURE AND AMOUNT ARE NOT TO BE TREATED AS DISCREPANCY.
THIRD PARTY DOCUMENTS EXCEPT INVOICE ARE ACCEPTABLE.
NAME OF THE DOCUMENTS EXCEPT BILL OF LADING AND INVOICE DIFFERENT FROM L/C BUT SERVE THE SAME PURPOSE ARE ACCEPTABLE.
ALL INVOICE(S) MUST INDICATE SHORE TO SHIP OR SHIP-TO-SHIP LOADING AND HS NO. 2710.1210
HOUSE/FORWARDER BILL OF LADING/NON-NEGOTIABLE SEA WAY BILL NOT ACCEPTABLE.
TENOR OF L/C TO READ AS ''AT 30 CALENDAR DAYS FROM NOR AT DISCHARGE PORT (NOR DATE TO COUNT AS DAY 1)''.
IN CASE THE VESSEL SINKS, DOCUMENT NO.1 OF FIELD 46A (NOR) AND DOCUMENT NO.10 OF FIELD 46A (CERTIFICATE OF RECEIPTED QUANTITY) ARE NOT REQUIRED FOR PAYMENT NEGOTIATION.
IF BENEFICIARY PRESENTS DOCUMENTS NO.1 OF FIELD 46A (NOR) THEN DOCUMENT NO.9 OF FIELD 46A (AUTHENTIC REPORT OF SHIPPING INTELLIGENCE) IS NOT REQUIRED FOR PAYMENT NEGOTIATION.
IF THE VESSEL SUNK, PAYMENT SHALL BE MADE TO THE BENEFICIARY AFTER 60 DAYS FROM THE DATE OF B/L (B/L DATE TO COUNT AS DAY ONE) ON THE BASIS OF B/L QUANTITY.
SHIPMENT ON ISRAELI, FLAGGED VESSELS NOT ALLOWED AND A CERTIFICATE TO THIS EFFECT FROM BENEFICIARY MUST ACCOMPANY ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS.

WE DISCLAIM LIABILITY FOR DELAY, NON-RETURN OF DOCUMENTS, NON-PAYMENT, OR OTHER ACTION OR INACTION COMPELLED BY RESTRICTIVE MEASURES, COUNTER-MEASURES, SANCTIONS LAWS, REGULATIONS OR EXECUTIVE OR JUDICIAL ORDERS MANDATORILY APPLICABLE TO US OR TO OUR CORRESPONDENT IN THE RELEVANT TRANSACTION.
DIFFERENCES IN QUANTITY SHOWN ON SHIPPING DOCUMENTS ARE ACCEPTABLE
THE MEASUREMENT OF QUANTITY RECEIVED ON VESSELS EXPERIENCE FACTOR CERTIFICATE SHOWING LAST CALL PORT INCONSISTENT WITH PORT CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE ACCEPTABLE.
QTY: 25,500 MT IN AIR PLUS / MINUS 05 PCT OF MOGAS 92-RON (WHEREVER APPEARS IN THE L/C)

ALL DOCUMENTS TO BE ISSUED IN ENGLISH LANGUAGE. . +++FIELD 44F+++++ PORT KEAMARI, KARACHI PAKISTAN/PORT QASIM (FOTCO) KARACHI PAKISTAN . +++CONT'D FROM FIELD 78+++ (+) UPON RECEIPT (DURING THE WORKING HOURS IN PAKISTAN) BY THE OPENER OF THE TESTED AUTHENTICATED SWIFT OF THE NEGOTIATING BANK CONFIRMING THAT THE NEGOTIATING BANK HAS NEGOTIATED DOCUMENTS ISSUED IN STRICT CONFORMITY WITH THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS CREDIT AND HAS DISPATCHED THE DOCUMENTS BY REGISTERED MAIL/ COURIER TO OUR ADDRESS SHOWING THE REGISTERED MAIL NO./ COURIER RECEIPT NO. AND DATE OF DISPATCH OF DOCUMENTS, THE NEGOTIATING BANK WILL REIMBURSE VIA REIMBURSING BANK AT MATURITY DATE ACCORDING TO ITS INSTRUCTIONS. HOWEVER, PAYMENT WILL BE EXECUTED AFTER 3 WORKING DAYS AFTER RECEIPT OF COMPLYING DOCUMENTS OR SWIFT MESSAGE CONFIRMING PRESENTATION OF COMPLYING DOCUMENTS

CLAUENO.27TOREADAS'LETTEROFAUTHORITYFORSIGNING BILLOFLADINGISACCEPTABLETOCOMPLYL/CCLAUSEFIELD46A-3.NO FURTHERDOCUMENTARYEVIDENCEWILLBEREQUIREDAGAINST'LETTEROF AUTHORITYFORSIGNINGBILLOFLADING'UNDERL/CCLAUSEFIELD 46A-3'
RON SHOULD NECESSARILY BE MENTIONED ON THE DOCUMENTS EXCEPT ON PORT CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE.

WHEN SIGNED BY AGENT OF THE MASTER, ONE COPY OR EMAIL OF MASTER'S AUTHORITY TO BE SUBMITTED FOR THE QUANTITY APPEARING ON BILL OF LADING. THE BILL OF LADING TO INDICATE, 'FREIGHT PREPAID' OR 'FREIGHT PAYABLE AS PER CHARTER PARTY AGREEMENT' AND TO BE DELIVERED TO THE PORT OF KEAMARI, KARACHI, PAKISTAN / PORT QASIM, (FOTCO) KARACHI, PAKISTAN.

3 SIGNED COPIES OF LOAD PORT INDEPENDENT INSPECTOR M/S CCIC SURVEYOR REPORT COMPRISING TANKER CLEANLINESS, PRODUCTS QUALITY AND QUANTITY CERTIFICATES, SHORE TANK MEASUREMENTS BEFORE AND AFTER LOADING AND THE MEASUREMENTS OF QUANTITY RECEIVED ON VESSEL'S EXPERIENCE FACTOR SHOWING AT LEAST LAST FIVE PORTS OF CALL OR LOAD PORT WITH DATES AND CARGOES CARRIED ISSUED BY LOAD PORT SURVEYOR M/S CCIC.

ONE ORIGINAL PLUS 3 SIGNED COPIES OF CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN ISSUED OR COUNTERSIGNED BY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE OR RELEVANT PORT AUTHORITIES OR RELEVANT TERMINAL OPERATOR (ISSUED IN THE NAME OF APPLICANT AS CONSIGNEE ACCEPTABLE) MENTIONING GOODS OF CHINA ORIGIN.
3 SIGNED COPIES OF TIME SHEET ISSUED BY M/S CCIC.
COPY OF MASTER'S RECEIPT FOR SEALED SAMPLES AT LOAD PORT (DULY SIGNED BY THE MASTER UNDER HIS OFFICIAL SEAL).

IN CASE THE VESSEL SINKS, THREE SIGNED COPIES OF AUTHENTIC REPORT OF SHIPPING INTELLIGENCE, A.I. LLOYDS OR REPORT FROM INSURER OF HULL AND MACHINERY OF VESSEL REGARDING SINKING OF VESSEL IN CASE VESSEL SINKS.

THREE SIGNED COPIES OF ''CERTIFICATE OF RECEIPTED QUANTITY'' ISSUED BY INDEPENDENT PETROLEUM INSPECTOR M/S TO BE NOMINATED AT DISCHARGE PORT, STATING THE NAME OF THE PRODUCT, NAME OF THE VESSEL, BILL OF LADING DATE, AND RECEIPTED QUANTITY IN METRIC TONS BASED ON SHORE TANK VOLUME CALCULATED BY APPLYING CORRESPONDING DENSITY OF EACH SHORE TANK AFTER RECEIPT AT DISCHARGE PORT AT 15 DEGREE C.
